title: UNP protest in Colombo on Friday (25)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A Satyagraha organized by the United National Party (UNP) will be held at 3 PM on Friday (25) at Hyde Park, Colombo.
UNP General Secretary, Palitha Range Bandara stated that this will be against the economic crisis faced the country.
The symbolic protest march organized by the 43 Brigade Youth Wing will commence on Friday (25) morning near the Digarolla Bridge in Moratuwa.
Kerawalapitiya Power Plant stops electricity generation as it has run out of fuel
